scripts.asbuild: pnpm run asbuild:debug && pnpm run asbuild:release
scripts.coverage:assembly: pnpm run asbuild:release && rm -rf .coverage coverage/assembly && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=.coverage node apps/simulation/tests/index.js && node scripts/aggregate-simulation-coverage.mjs
scripts.coverage:ui: rm -rf .coverage-ui coverage/orchestrator && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=.coverage-ui vitest run && node scripts/aggregate-simulation-coverage.mjs --coverage-dir .coverage-ui --out-dir coverage/orchestrator --include apps/orchestrator/ --label Orchestrator --warn-missing-wasm false
